file_content.text: This is base command to Legate.
Agent Chance has failed to report in; therefore, I have to assume he's compromised. You are now primary on this mission.
Chance was shot by Imperial scouts. By the time I found him, it was too late.
He was killed.
I see. Send me the coordinates later. His family will want the body.
He probably got distracted by a shiny puddle.
I'm sure he'll turn up.
Have some respect. He's part of our team.
I just heard from Agent Chance. His injuries are extensive. You are now primary on this mission.
How do I proceed, sir?
Understood.
Is Chance going to recover?
How's Chance doing?
He'll live. Whether he'll come back on duty, I don't know.
Chance got what he deserved. I saved his life, but I shouldn't have had to.
He was careless.
I'm glad to have had your assessment. I'll talk to him when he's fit for duty.
Keyword: onomatophobia. Your new objective is to retrieve the Ultrawave Transmitter from Ki Sazen.
I still want the Jedi taken down if possible, but she can't be our priority.
I'm on my way to Ki Sazen's hideout now. Consider the job done.
I'll get the transmitter.
What makes the Ultrawave Transmitter important?
Why the change of objective?
That's not your concern. Just get it back to me.
Ki Sazen's hideout is behind Republic lines. I'll have to kill people to get there.
I'll be fighting the Republic.
I understand. But there aren't any other SIS agents on Taris. No other way to make this work.
May the Force be with you. Base command out.
Code name Legate calling base command. Come in, base command.
Base command here. Patching secondary stream.
Code name Chance here. Ready for mission briefing.
You two met on Nar Shaddaa, so I'll skip the introductions. Welcome to Taris--a thousand years of civilization reduced to toxic muck.
Fill me in on the operation.
What's the situation?
I'm glad we're getting the chance to work together.
[Flirt] Hello, Chance.
Thank you, sir. You... impressed us at the droid factory.
Thank you, sir. Agent Chance.
Good to see you both.
It could be worse. I was assigned to Hutta--twice.
This is where you send me?
I spent a week in the Coruscant sewers once.
A long time ago, Taris was a Republic world. A Sith Lord bombed it. Now we're trying to rebuild and the Empire's unhappy.
Your people sent shock troops, devastator units.
It's a mess. The last thing we need is a rogue element, but that's what we've got.
Along with Sith and Republic troops, there's a corrupt Jedi down there. You're going to stop her.
Who is she? What does she want?
Tell me the details.
I thought Jedi were supposed to be incorruptible.
A corrupt Jedi? Really?
They're not perfect. But they're supposed to know better.
I've fought my share of Jedi. They're not as dangerous as the legends claim.
She won't know what hit her.
They're not pushovers, either.
Ki Sazen--Jedi Knight and hero of Tas-La. Rising star in the Jedi Order, but she's rotten to the core.
Half her missions end with someone dying. Technology and artifacts disappear from under her protection.
Her last report said she'd come to Taris because "the Force" called her here.
I believe Ki Sazen is building a power base. I need you to find out how and why, and bring me hard evidence.
This sounds like an internal security matter.
Why come to me?
It would be, if the Jedi would let us pursue it. They won't, so it's up to you.
You sound like you're taking this personally.
This really bothers you.
I'm disappointed, is all. But you're right--no good fretting.
Why bother with evidence? I can solve your problem with one shot.
I should just kill her.
If it comes to that... do it. But I want her brought to justice if possible.
Chance will be your contact. He'll take it from here.
Yes, sir. Surveilling Ki Sazen has been difficult, but we believe she recently mounted a raid on an Empire-controlled laboratory.
We'll begin our investigation there. You need to obtain access to the laboratory from Imperial Command.
Get to the laboratory and find out what Ki Sazen was up to. Understood.
Let's get to it.
That's my girl. Base command out.
That's my boy. Base command out.
You said Ki Sazen is interested in technology. What exactly was she looking for?
Why raid a laboratory?
That's what I'd like you to find out.
Suppose I refuse. Can Agent Chance force me to obey?
It's not like I can say "no."
Chance may be young, but he has all the experience and authority he needs.
Now get to work--both of you. Base command out.
Sir--I'll monitor your holocalls to track the investigation. I'll be in touch soon.
